# SYNAPSE Verification Transcript — Example

This transcript shows the expected output when verifying
the example-segment.jsonl against the example-manifest.json.

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
SYNAPSE SEGMENT VERIFICATION v1.0
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Input:
  Segment: example-segment.jsonl
  Manifest: example-manifest.json
  Public Key: d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1...

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
STEP 1: Parse JSONL
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  ✅ Line 1: Parsed successfully
  ✅ Line 2: Parsed successfully
  ✅ Line 3: Parsed successfully
  
  Records found: 3

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
STEP 2: Validate Hash Chain
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  Record 1:
    seq: 1 ✅
    prevHash: GENESIS ✅
    recordHash: a1b2c3d4... (verified) ✅
  
  Record 2:
    seq: 2 ✅
    prevHash: a1b2c3d4... (matches R1) ✅
    recordHash: b2c3d4e5... (verified) ✅
  
  Record 3:
    seq: 3 ✅
    prevHash: b2c3d4e5... (matches R2) ✅
    recordHash: c3d4e5f6... (verified) ✅
  
  Hash chain: VALID ✅

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
STEP 3: Compute Segment Digest
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  File bytes: 1847
  SHA-256: e4f5a6b7c8d9e0f1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9c0d1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b1c2d3e4f5
  
  Manifest digest: e4f5a6b7c8d9e0f1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9c0d1e2f3a4b5c6d7e8f9a0b1c2d3e4f5
  
  Digest match: VALID ✅

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
STEP 4: Verify Signature
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  Algorithm: ed25519
  Public Key ID: d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1
  Signature: TUVXQVJFOlRoaXNJc0FuRXhh... (base64)
  
  Ed25519.verify(): VALID ✅

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
STEP 5: Check Manifest Consistency
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

  seqStart: manifest=1, data=1 ✅
  seqEnd: manifest=3, data=3 ✅
  recordCount: manifest=3, data=3 ✅
  chainId: manifest=example-chain, data=example-chain ✅
  headHash: manifest=c3d4e5f6..., data=c3d4e5f6... ✅
  
  Manifest consistency: VALID ✅

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
VERIFICATION RESULT
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

{
  "ok": true,
  "failures": [],
  "stats": {
    "seqStart": 1,
    "seqEnd": 3,
    "recordCount": 3,
    "chainId": "example-chain"
  }
}

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
✅ SEGMENT VERIFIED SUCCESSFULLY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Note: This is an EXAMPLE transcript. Your implementation should
produce equivalent results when processing the same inputs.
